section.title: Installation
section.para: The monitoring service is automatically installed as part of the &productname; installation.
No specific configuration is required to use Monasca. However, you can configure the database for storing metrics as explained in .

section.title: Differences Between Upstream and &productname; Implementations
section.para: In &productname;, the OpenStack monitoring service, Monasca, is included as the monitoring solution, except for the following which are not included:

note.para: Icinga was supported in previous &productname; versions but it has been deprecated in &product;.

section.title: For More Information
section.para: For more details on OpenStack Monasca, see Monasca.io

section.title: Back-end Database
section.para: The monitoring service default metrics database is Cassandra, which is a highly-scalable analytics database and the recommended database for &productname;.
You can learn more about Cassandra at Apache Cassandra.
